content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup" )

content.text: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers" )

content.text: 0) In a large saucepan on medium heat, saute onion until clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "saute"@39:44 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "onion"@45:50 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until clear"@51:62 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@26:37 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add tomato soup, mushroom soup, and canned tomatoes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "tomato soup"@7:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "mushroom soup"@20:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "canned tomatoes"@39:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Place the crawfish into the pan and simmer for 25 minutes.
